channel.title: Filesize restriction when uploading to SD-card
channel.description: I'm making a drum machine that uses longer sound files. The uploader skips my RAW-files that are larger than 8MB - why this restriction? The upload is also quite slow, can I just put the files on the SD card directly from my computer?

item.title: Filesize restriction when uploading to SD-card
item.dc:creator: @kloroplaster
item.description:
@kloroplaster wrote:

Thank you! I realised it was much faster to just add the files directly

Read full topic
item.source: Filesize restriction when uploading to SD-card

item.title: Filesize restriction when uploading to SD-card
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

They're skipped for automatic upload, because upload is quite slow, and you'd probably be faster putting them on sdcard with a cardreader. So far there is no clean way to abort an upload, inadvertently initiating the upload of a large file 'd be annoying.

Read full topic
item.source: Filesize restriction when uploading to SD-card
